pages.text: $(#630000)When fighting mobs and with line of sight, Enhanced Mobs will produce Motes to hunt down their targets, more aggressive variants of Shulker Bullets.
$(#630000)Motes are fast and relentless, and unlike standard Shulker Bullets, can travel through walls and won't take damage from hits for the first 10 seconds of their existence.

$(#630000)When they hit something, they will attempt to apply $(l:potions/gravity)Gravity$()$(#630000) if the target is high enough off of the ground, teleporting the Enhanced Mob that created it to its location if it fails. Either way, it will deal quite a bit of damage and can deal critical hits.
